name: Mirror Maze (Adakin Wiley)
description:
A mirror maze made for Mini Jam 121 (https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-121-reflection)

DOUBLE CLICK THE SCREEN TO LOCK YOUR MOUSE

You can use the left and right mouse buttons to extend your arms, this will help you navigate the maze

If you can make it to the end, send a screenshot of the game so I can say "wow, you have some dedication"
